chapters.title: Chapter 5: Somethingâ€¦Strange
chapters.info: Lacile Aldorwin, p. 178—Tiny Cairhienin woman, taken captive by the Shaido along with Faile and her servants. The man who captured her, Jhoradin, has fallen in love with her; it is not known whether Lacile returns his feelings or is simply pretending in order to ensure her protection.
